nodes.text: TX-532 was a T-series military strategic analysis and tactics droid who served in the Separatist Droid Army during the Clone Wars.
At one point, TX-532 led an operation from the spy ship 090192 on Naboo to recruit Gungans to the Confederacy of Independent Systems. The ship was hidden in the forest a few kilometers from Shoril.

TX-532 appears in a Modular Encounter in Fantasy Flight Games' 2019 roleplaying game sourcebook Rise of the Separatists. The encounter suggests that if the heroes board the ship and defeat the droid, that it self-destructs. If it manages to escape, the ship is then engaged by a Naboo starfighter patrol.
